edu.oakland.mvc.portlet

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.oakland.mvc.portlet.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders the main portlet view containing information about when the user last changed their password.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-08-30
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String getEnvironment
      Used within the database query to specify the environment
      private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate
      Used to query the database for password information
      protected Log logger
      A Log for this particular class
      private IViewSelector viewSelector
      Used to determine which portlet theme to use

      MainController()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long current()
      Returns a long that can be checked against the most recent date the user changed their password.

      No-op action mapping to prevent accidental calls to this URL from crashing the portlet.

      • MainController

    • Method Detail

      • setDataSource

        public void setDataSource(javax.sql.DataSource ds)
        Sets the value of jdbcTemplate in preparation to query the database for password information.
        Parameters:
        ds - A DataSource which represents the physical data source and is a factory for its connections

      • setViewSelector

        public void setViewSelector(IViewSelector viewSelector)
        Sets the value of viewSelector in preparation to show the main view.
        Parameters:
        viewSelector - An IViewSelector which is used in determing whether to use the mobile or desktop theme.

      • showMainView

        public ModelAndView showMainView(RenderRequest request,
                        RenderResponse response)
        Returns both the Model and View inside of a single object which will then be displayed to the user. This View displays information contained in the Model about when the password was last changed. If the logger is enabled, a log will be made of the results.
        Parameters:
        request - A RenderRequest that contains information about which theme is to be used
        response - A RenderResponse that contains information about how to further render the portlet
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView that holds the model and view to be used with this controller.

      • current

        public long current()
        Returns a long that can be checked against the most recent date the user changed their password. This is in order to determine what to display in the View.
        Returns:
        Days since January 1, 1970 UTC

      • doAction

        public void doAction()
        No-op action mapping to prevent accidental calls to this URL from crashing the portlet.
